lines: Kurĩa Daudi aaciarĩiruo, Tene kwarĩ kĩugu;
Mutumia na Kaana, nyina nĩwe Mariamu,
Jesu nĩoimire Iguru, Akĩĩnyihia guuku thĩ,
Nĩ kiugu-inĩ aaciarĩiruo, Na agĩkomio muharatĩ;
Mwaathani nĩaatuurire, O ta ngĩa na e munene.
Na hiingo yake ya waana, Kuhoorera no Jesu;
Nĩendaga Nyina muno; Aarĩ Mwaana muigua ma,
Twaana tutu, mutuĩke, Twaana twega o take.
Aakurire o ta ithuĩ, Na nĩonaga o urĩa tuonaga;
Aaiguaga kĩeha na gĩkeno, Na agatheka na akarĩra;
O na rĩu amenyaga, Twathĩĩna na twakena.
Nĩtukaamuona na maitho, Tondu nĩwe watukuurire:
Mwaana ucio muhooreri, Rĩu nĩ Mwene-Hinya-Wothe;
Ningĩ kuu aathire, Nĩagatwara ciana ciake.
